page.title: 12LIFE IN LEASOWE (PAGE 2)
page.content:
{Have you any problems with housing? Not really.Generally they are well built,although some people have had trouble with damp and condensation. When houses are vacated they are left boarded up and empty for too long, which spoils the look of the area. Small fences are needed around the front lawns,and then the gardens could be made tidy and colourful.It would be pleasant to have more trees to soften the look of the estate.
{How good are the facilities for {children on the estate? For the older children the Leisure Centre and Adventure Playground are great,but a Park would be useful,with good,safe swings.There are not enough Nursery School places available.Too many children are allowed to hang around the pub of an evening.{(contd)
